revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Cave of Origin |image = [[File:Cave of Origin.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Cave of Origin. |tokens = 34,000 |location = On the West of Route 126, Northwest of Sootopolis City. }} '''Cave of Origin''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 590,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || colspan=2 rowspan=4|<center> N/A |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Sableye.png|40px]] Sableye |- | [[File:Mawile.png|40px]] Mawile |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Exploud.png|40px]] Exploud || <center>2,000,000 || colspan=3 rowspan=3|<center> N/A |- | [[File:Kyogre.png|40px]] '''Kyogre*''' || rowspan=2|<center>4,700,000 |- | [[File:Groudon.png|40px]] '''Groudon*''' |- |}
'''*Must be Hoenn Champion to unlock Kyogre and Groudon'''
==Items==
<tabs> <tab name="Base"> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 250 Clears !! 500 Clears !! Requirement |- | align="center" colspan=7| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 1 || 78.10% || 75.95% || 72.58% || 66.67% || <center>N/A |- | align="center" colspan=7| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || 1 || 10.42% || 11.07% || 12.08% || 13.86% || rowspan=2| <center>N/A |- | {{Bag2|Ochre Shard}} || 1 || 10.42% || 11.07% || 12.08% || 13.86% |- | align="center" colspan=7| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || 1 || 1.04% || 1.68% || 2.68% || 4.43% || <center>N/A |- | align="center" colspan=7| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Protein}} || 1 || N/A || N/A || N/A || 0.59% || 400 Clears |- | {{Bag2|Lum}} || 1 || N/A || N/A || 0.29% || 0.59% || 150 Clears |} The odds are very slightly off due to chances getting redistributed while the requirement locked loot is unavailable. </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> After reaching [[Kalos]], the drop chance for items will be [[Dungeons#Dungeon Loot Regional Debuff|debuffed]].
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 250 Clears !! 500 Clears !! Requirement |- | align="center" colspan=7| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 1 || 75.68% || 75.68% || 75.68% || 75.68% || <center>N/A |- | align="center" colspan=7| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || 1 || 12.11% || 12.11% || 12.11% || 12.11% || rowspan=2| <center>N/A |- | {{Bag2|Ochre Shard}} || 1 || 12.11% || 12.11% || 12.11% || 12.11% |- | align="center" colspan=7| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || 1 || 0.10% || 0.10% || 0.10% || 0.10% || <center>N/A |- | align="center" colspan=7| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Protein}} || 1 || N/A || N/A || N/A || <0.01% || 400 Clears |- | {{Bag2|Lum}} || 1 || N/A || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || 150 Clears |} The odds are very slightly off due to chances getting redistributed while the requirement locked loot is unavailable. </tab> </tabs>
